an4.82:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.82:1.3: Musavadi hoti, pisunavaco hoti, pharusavaco hoti, samphappalapi hoti—
an4.82:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.82:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.82:2.3: Musavada pativirato hoti, pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti, pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti, samphappalapa pativirato hoti—
an4.82:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
